name: Stamp Stan
description:
Stamp Stan

Made in 8 hours for the Enhance-Jam with the theme of Collect!

Collect all the stamps to add to your collection!

Don't rip them off too fast or they'll tear!

Don't peel them off too slow or you'll run out of time!

The fun is endless!!!

Controls

Left Mouse Hold - Rip stamp from envelope

Tab - Switch between game and stamp book

Space - Spawn new stamp

Credit

All programming + assets done by myself & Harrison Leitch
